OOG.content: re: Husserl’s Origin…, delay is the philosophical absolute, all methodic reflection begins in the consciousness of another previous, possible, and absolute origin
OOG.linkedContent: re: Husserl’s Origin…, delay is the philosophical absolute, all methodic reflection begins in the consciousness of another previous, possible, and absolute origin

OOG.content: this phenomenological delay, the alterity of absolute origin can only be recognized in my Living Present, reduction is pure thought as delay
OOG.linkedContent: this phenomenological delay, the alterity of absolute origin can only be recognized in my Living Present, reduction is pure thought as delay

OOG.content: could there be any philosophy if consciousness of delay was not primordial and pure
OOG.linkedContent: could there be any philosophy if consciousness of delay was not primordial and pure

OOG.content: primordial consciousness of delay can only have the pure form of anticipation
OOG.linkedContent: primordial consciousness of delay can only have the pure form of anticipation

H.content: we are always in some way late; “the consciousness only anticipates, ever, one delay too many”
H.linkedContent: we are always in some way late; “the consciousness only anticipates, ever, one delay too many”

H.content: delay and haste, halting and hastening, rhythm of Oedipus’ journey; p. 127 infinite speed contracted into an absolute halt or haste, precipitation because delay, instant of an instant that is canceled out > thus always late & precipitous re: hospitality
H.linkedContent: delay and haste, halting and hastening, rhythm of Oedipus’ journey; p. 127 infinite speed contracted into an absolute halt or haste, precipitation because delay, instant of an instant that is canceled out > thus always late & precipitous re: hospitality

BL.content: time: resolution of non-resolution—brings story into being and sustains it, only appears after law of delay, advance of law, anachrony of relation
BL.linkedContent: time: resolution of non-resolution—brings story into being and sustains it, only appears after law of delay, advance of law, anachrony of relation

SPOM.content: “there is the pledge (il y a le gage),” even before, perhaps, a decision confirms it > responds w/out delay to demand of justice
SPOM.linkedContent: “there is the pledge (il y a le gage),” even before, perhaps, a decision confirms it > responds w/out delay to demand of justice

LOBL.content: like death, arrêt remains undecidable, one arrêt marks delay, the other haste [2 syntaxes]
LOBL.linkedContent: like death, arrêt remains undecidable, one arrêt marks delay, the other haste [2 syntaxes]

LOBL.content: survivre delays at once life & death, line of least sure sur-, no clear-cut opposition, living on like differance, beyond identity & difference > tele-phone, tele-gram only 2 modes of this teleography in which trace, grapheme, does come secondarily but marks telic structure a priori
LOBL.linkedContent: survivre delays at once life & death, line of least sure sur-, no clear-cut opposition, living on like differance, beyond identity & difference > tele-phone, tele-gram only 2 modes of this teleography in which trace, grapheme, does come secondarily but marks telic structure a priori

LOBL.content: narrator is always away (at a distance, tele-)
LOBL.linkedContent: narrator is always away (at a distance, tele-)

HERP.content: for Heidegger, philosophy seeks after, comes later than harmony, this delay eroticizes philosophical search, tension of Eros; Heraclitus & Parmenides not philosophers, no straining, no erotic pas, in accord, Einklang, homology w/ logos
HERP.linkedContent: for Heidegger, philosophy seeks after, comes later than harmony, this delay eroticizes philosophical search, tension of Eros; Heraclitus & Parmenides not philosophers, no straining, no erotic pas, in accord, Einklang, homology w/ logos

VM.content: Man is a God arrived too early, a God who knows himself forever late in relation to the already-there of Being (qui se sait à jamais en retard sur le déjà-là de l’Être)
VM.linkedContent: Man is a God arrived too early, a God who knows himself forever late in relation to the already-there of Being (qui se sait à jamais en retard sur le déjà-là de l’Être)

FSW.content: Freud [of Beyond…] complies w/ dual necessity: differance at origin, crossing-out concept primariness > delay is in the beginning
FSW.linkedContent: Freud [of Beyond…] complies w/ dual necessity: differance at origin, crossing-out concept primariness > delay is in the beginning

T.content: is there any ruse not belonging to reason which will prevent philosophy from borrowing its categories from logos of other, affecting itself w/out delay [see POOF p. 1]?
T.linkedContent: is there any ruse not belonging to reason which will prevent philosophy from borrowing its categories from logos of other, affecting itself w/out delay [see POOF p. 1]?

DIF.content: radical alterity of every possible mode of presence marked by irreducibility of aftereffect (d’après-coup), of delay (de retardement) [Nächtriglichkeit]
DIF.linkedContent: radical alterity of every possible mode of presence marked by irreducibility of aftereffect (d’après-coup), of delay (de retardement) [Nächtriglichkeit]

WAP.content: hegemonic belatedness (retard-hégémonique): [presence, glory, of the empire after its demise?]
WAP.linkedContent: hegemonic belatedness (retard-hégémonique): [presence, glory, of the empire after its demise?]

SW.content: [read Cixous’ Savoir] only in a French to come, only happen in delayed form—inheriting w/out inheriting, reinventing mother & father [baby daddy]
SW.linkedContent: [read Cixous’ Savoir] only in a French to come, only happen in delayed form—inheriting w/out inheriting, reinventing mother & father [baby daddy]

DST.content: no matter how “free” or deconstructed the response, one cannot reduce the delay (retard): an event, a law, a call are already there (others are there, for/before whom one must answer); “response inaugurates nothing if it does not come after”
DST.linkedContent: no matter how “free” or deconstructed the response, one cannot reduce the delay (retard): an event, a law, a call are already there (others are there, for/before whom one must answer); “response inaugurates nothing if it does not come after”

DST.content: delay as inevitable, delay re: one’s “own” birth, experience of “abortion” > a subject that cannot identify itself because ineluctably delayed [Lacan’s human born prematurely]
DST.linkedContent: delay as inevitable, delay re: one’s “own” birth, experience of “abortion” > a subject that cannot identify itself because ineluctably delayed [Lacan’s human born prematurely]

TN.content: anesthetic interruption in heart of aesthetic phenomenality, anesthetics very ecstasy at heart of pleasure, pleasure as differance w/out delay > plier, prier and invent substitutes, prostheses, fetishes, cultures, technics (all of “history,” before and beyond “hand of man”)
TN.linkedContent: anesthetic interruption in heart of aesthetic phenomenality, anesthetics very ecstasy at heart of pleasure, pleasure as differance w/out delay > plier, prier and invent substitutes, prostheses, fetishes, cultures, technics (all of “history,” before and beyond “hand of man”)

OG.content: restitution of presence by language: symbolic/immediate, se passe de passer par le monde: touching is touched, jouissance not deferred: auto-affection se donne pour autarcie pure, it does not wait (n’attend pas) > but, auto-affection pure speculation, present delivered is chimera, the no longer deferred is absolutely deferred: acc. Rousseau, sign/image/representation sont des illusions qui donnent le change (sidetrack us) [differance w/out delay]
OG.linkedContent: restitution of presence by language: symbolic/immediate, se passe de passer par le monde: touching is touched, jouissance not deferred: auto-affection se donne pour autarcie pure, it does not wait (n’attend pas) > but, auto-affection pure speculation, present delivered is chimera, the no longer deferred is absolutely deferred: acc. Rousseau, sign/image/representation sont des illusions qui donnent le change (sidetrack us) [differance w/out delay]

OG.content: “l’abîme, c’est le creux qui peut rester ouvert entre la défaillance de la nature et le retard du supplément” [abyss as delay, hollow, open]; pure law restores (gives back to people) liberty, gives back to presence its sovereignty [sutures abyss], pure law a supplement of supplement
OG.linkedContent: “l’abîme, c’est le creux qui peut rester ouvert entre la défaillance de la nature et le retard du supplément” [abyss as delay, hollow, open]; pure law restores (gives back to people) liberty, gives back to presence its sovereignty [sutures abyss], pure law a supplement of supplement

CIR.content: foreskin & truth (detour/delay): question of knowing by whom by what the violence of circumcision was imposed

SPEC.content: reality principle as courier, lieutenant, of PP, disciplining disciple, defers enjoyment, the waystation (relais) of a differance (Aufschub), auf dem langen Umwege zur Lust, as if RP produces a socius, institution, contract of discipline
